thread.title: SmartBear Hosts Live Demonstrations of Testing Tools at STARWEST 2015
thread.title_full: SmartBear Hosts Live Demonstrations of Testing Tools at STARWEST 2015

author: admin
title: SmartBear Hosts Live Demonstrations of Testing Tools at STARWEST 2015
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/29/2015 @ 3:01 AM Companies mentioned in this article: SmartBear Software 
SOMERVILLE, Mass. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- SmartBear Software , the leader in software quality tools for the connected world, is demonstrating its automated testing tools at STARWEST on Wednesday, September 30 – Thursday, October 1, 2015 in Anaheim, California, booth #53. SmartBear is demonstrating automated testing tool, TestComplete , test management tool, QAComplete and load testing solution, LoadComplete . STARWEST attracts the latest solutions in testing technologies, software and tools from some of today’s most progressive and innovative organizations. 
WHAT : SmartBear’s Testing Tools at STARWEST 2015 
WHEN: Wednesday, September 30 – Thursday, October 1, 2015 
WHERE: Disneyland Hotel, 1150 West Magic Way, Anaheim, CA 92802 
One of the world’s most recognized automated testing tools and winner of four Dr. Dobb’s Jolt Awards since 2010, TestComplete empowers any tester, both novice and advanced, to create, manage and run automated tests for any desktop, Web and mobile application. For the latest updates on TestComplete, follow @TestComplete on Twitter. For more information, visit: http://smartbear.com/product/testcomplete/overview/ . 
The one and only tool needed for test management, QAComplete provides the ability to plan, organize and schedule all of the tests associated with releases. For the latest updates, follow @QAComplete on Twitter. For more information on QAComplete, visit: http://smartbear.com/product/test-management-tool/qacomplete/ . 
LoadComplete allows designing and running performance, stress and load tests for mobile, websites and Web applications. For the latest updates, follow @LoadCompleteSB . For more information, visit: http://smartbear.com/product/loadcomplete/overview/ . 
For more information on STARWEST, visit: http://starwest.techwell.com/ . 
About SmartBear Software 
As the leader in software quality tools for the connected world, SmartBear supports more than three million software professionals and over 25,000 organizations in 194 countries that use its products to build and deliver the world’s greatest applications. With today’s applications deploying on mobile, Web, desktop, Internet of Things (IoT) or even embedded computing platforms, the connected nature of these applications through public and private APIs presents a unique set of challenges for developers, testers and operations teams. SmartBear's software quality tools assist with code review, functional and load testing, API readiness as well as performance monitoring of these modern applications. For more information, visit: http://smartbear.com , or for the SmartBear community, go to: Facebook , Twitter , LinkedIn or Google+ . All trademarks recognized.
